transactionPayerHint: Select the user from which the amount will be transferred.
receivePaymentText: Select who received what you provided, describe what you provided, and enter the value.
sendPaymentText: Select who provided what you received, describe what you received, and enter the value.
enableNotificationsText: Enable notifications to be aware of trade activity related to you and important news in your community. You can configure or disable them later.
transactionPayeeHint: Select the user the who will receive the transfer.
editCurrencyText: Define the main attributes of your community's units
